name: Original Body Butter 100% Vegan & Fragrance Free
description:
Our Original Body Butter is nutrient rich so nourish yourself
hydrate & heal your skin with an anti-oxidant abundant superior moisturizer.  

Our 100% natural formula is your secret weapon in maintaining a youthful glow, while keeping your skin soft and supple with a satin finish.

It penetrates deep to prevent dryness.

Reduces fine lines & wrinkles with continued use.

Evens your tone & helps skin heal faster.

With the amazing healing properties in our luxurious body butters you'll have great success in the treatment of blemishes, skin allergies, eczema, minor cuts, scrapes, soothing sunburns and minor inflammations. 

A premiere product that will keep your skin looking young & healthy for years to come.

Recommended For: Dull, Damaged, Dry, Flaky, Irritated and Sensitive Skin.

Whats In It: unrefined shea butter, extra virgin coconut oil, grapeseed oil, almond oil, avocado oil
 
Main Benefits: Skin Soothing and Anti-Inflammatory Properties, Heals Sun Damage, Moisturizes, Nourishes, Protects, Restores Skin Health, Softens Skin and Nourished Lips
 
Made naturally without GMO's, gluten, paraben preservatives, petrochemicals, phthalates, sulfates, synthetic colors, dyes or fragrances. Gluten-Free 100% Eco-friendly, Vegetarian & Cruelty-Free.

name: Pink Lemonade Body Butter with Organic Pomegranate Seed & Lemongrass Essential Oils
description:
Bask in the Wondrous scent of Pomegranate & fresh Lemons.

Right out of the shower, Pamper yourself from head to toe.

With our Pink Lemonade Body Butter, smaller pours & anti-aging is yours. Stay baby soft, young & tight with the strong anti-oxidants & soothing effects our formula has on skin.

Recommended For: Dull, Damaged, Dry, Flaky, Irritated and Sensitive Skin

Whats In It: pomegranate seed oil, lemongrass essential oil, unrefined shea butter, extra virgin coconut oil, grapeseed oil, almond oil, avocado oil

Made naturally without GMO's, gluten, paraben preservatives, petrochemicals, phthalates, sulfates, synthetic colors or dyes. Gluten-Free 100% Eco-friendly, Vegetarian & Cruelty-Free.

description:
Our Cocoa Banana Body Butter is packed with potassium & vitamins A to keep you boasting that beautiful glow.

Hydration reduces wrinkles & raw cacao is loaded with the antioxidants your skin craves.

Cocoa & Banana with a scent so sweet it's good enough to eat and since health and luxury go hand & hand you can indulge in this treat without feeling guilty.

Recommended For: Dull, Damaged, Dry, Flaky, Irritated and Sensitive Skin

name: Healthy Hair Naturals - Peppermint Cream
description:
Unveil the true potential of your hair "the natural way" synthetic free.

Formulated with 10 different nourishing natural oils & emollients specifically designed to:
 
Increase circulation to the scalp & stimulate growth.

Balance the PH levels of your scalp to stop dryness and excess oil build up.

Penetrates deep into the cortex layer of the hair to replenish lipids for an intense softness. 

Moisturize & condition hair for a young & naturally vibrant glow.  

Seal cuticles to lock in nutrients and facilitate a long lasting healthy look & feel.

Greatly improve the elasticity, strength & length of hair.

Protection against extreme temperatures, control frizz, drastically minimize split ends & breakage. 

Rich in protein + vitamins A, B1, B2, B3, B6, D, E

Whats In It:
Peppermint Essential Oil, Wheat germ Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Coconut Oil, Almond Oil, Unrefined Shea, Argan Oil, Jojoba Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil & Black Castor Oil

Made naturally without GMO's, paraben preservatives, petrochemicals, phthalates, sulfates, synthetic colors, dyes or fragrances. 100% Eco-friendly, Vegetarian & Cruelty-Free.

name: Organic Black Soap
description:
Premium Quality from The Original Recipe passed down for Generations through the Centuries. 

All Natural from Mother Nature, for Royal Skin that is Silky, Smooth, Clear & Beautiful. 

Sacred Vitality brings you Black Soap from the land of Ghana.

Made to improve the quality and health of your appearance enjoy a Superior Cleanse with a Rich Lather and an Organic Scent.

Alleviate Severe & Chronic Skin Pathologies such as Acne, Scars, Eczema and Burns for Ageless Blemish Free Skin. 

Absorb Odor, Destroy Bacteria & Fungus with this Miracle soap enriched with essential minerals and vitamin A & E plus it's ample skin softening properties, truly an amazing product.

Contains: 
No Fragrance
No Sodium Hydroxide
No Animal Fat
No Synthetics of any kind, 

Suitable for ALL skin types: 
Dry/Oily/Acne/ Sensitive

100% Natural
100% Vegan 
100% Organic
